actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 29, 1949, to require the Federal Government to purchase more materials and goods manufactured in the United States.

summary.text: States that the costs of goods manufactured in the United States and required for public use shall not be deemed unreasonable under the Buy American Act unless the price of such goods is more than ten percent higher than like foreign-made goods.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 29, 1949, to require the Federal Government to purchase more materials and goods manufactured in the United States.
